CONFIGURATION (Group 3)
   ↓ set_pkg() configures the project scope
   
2. INITIALIZATION (Group 3)
   ↓ install_hooks() deploys CustomLoader
   
3. RUNTIME (Groups 2 & 1)
   ↓ As modules import:
   ├─ CustomLoader triggers
   ├─ Group 2 resolves and validates the import
   └─ Group 1 updates the graph
   
4. QUERYING (Group 1)
   ↓ get_import_graph() returns the results
   
5. CLEANUP (Group 3)
   ↓ remove_hooks() restores original
